ingredients.ingredient: 1 (16 ounce) package water-packed firm tofu, drained and rinsed
salt and ground black pepper to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Press tofu thoroughly to remove excess moisture; this is key for crispy edges
Cut tofu into thin slices or cubes for maximum surface area and crispiness
Don't move tofu too frequently; let it develop a golden crust before flipping
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide me through pressing and pan-frying tofu to achieve a crispy exterior with a creamy center.
